## Random Forest

### Grouped Categorical Data
```{r}
rfGrid <- data.frame(mtry = c(5, 10, 20, 32, 50, 100, 250, 500, 1000))

set.seed(1056)
rf.group <- train(
    Party ~ .,
    data = train.set,
    method = "rf",
    trControl = trCtrl,
    tuneGrid = rfGrid,
    metric = "ROC"
)
```

### Independent Categorical Data
```{r}
set.seed(1056)
rf.group <- train(
    Party ~ .,
    data = train.dv,
    method = "rf",
    trControl = trCtrl,
    tuneGrid = rfGrid,
    metric = "ROC"
)
```

gbmGrid <- list(tuneGrid = expand.grid(interaction.depth = c(1, 3, 5, 7, 9), n.trees = (1:20)*100, shrinkage = c(0.01, 0.1), n.minobsinnode = 20))


```{r}

gbmGrid <- expand.grid(
    interaction.depth = c(1, 3, 5, 7, 9), 
    n.trees = (1:20)*100, 
    shrinkage = c(0.01, 0.1), 
    n.minobsinnode = 20
)

set.seed(1056)

gbm.mdl <- train(
    Party ~ .,
    data = train.dv,
    method = "gbm",
    trControl = trCtrl,
    tuneGrid = gbmGrid,
    metric = "ROC"
)
```
